clone.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an animal or plant produced by scientists from one cell of another animal or plant, so that they are exactly the same
clone.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a computer that is built as an exact copy of a more famous computer
clone.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone or something that looks and behaves exactly the same as someone or something else
clone.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: She’s an exact clone of her sister!
clone.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make an exact copy of a plant or animal by taking a cell from it and developing it artificially
clone.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to copy the number of someone else’s mobile phone onto a new chip and then use that number on a different telephone, so that the mobile phone’s owner receives the telephone bill
clone.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a computer that is almost an exact copy of a different type of computer and can use programs that were written for it
clone.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: to copy the details from someone’s bank card or credit card in order to illegally create a new card
clone.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: I contacted the bank and was told my debit card had been cloned and my account had been emptied.
